_metadata.notes: Subsidy programme encyclopedia for NexusNovus pipeline. Covers Phase 1-4 instruments.

programmes.name: DHI — Demonstration Projects, Feasibility Studies & Investment Preparation
programmes.use_case: Export feasibility, demonstration projects for Dutch companies in developing countries
programmes.eligibility: Dutch SME or company with Dutch operations. Exporter-of-record must be NL entity.
programmes.notes: Core instrument for NexusNovus. Multiple tracks: quickscan, feasibility, demonstration. 50% for large firms, 70% for SME. De minimis cap EUR 300k rolling 3yr.

programmes.name: MIT Haalbaarheid — SME Innovation Feasibility
programmes.use_case: Quick feasibility scan for SME innovation projects
programmes.eligibility: Dutch SME only.
programmes.notes: Small ticket, fast turnaround. Good for initial validation before larger DHI or DEI+ application.

programmes.name: WBSO — R&D Tax Credit
programmes.use_case: R&D wage cost reduction — stacks with grants
programmes.eligibility: Any NL company performing qualifying R&D.
programmes.notes: Tax-based, does not count as state aid overlap. Can combine with DHI/DEI+/MOOI on same project. 2026 tier-1 ceiling EUR 391,020; tier-1 rate 36% (starters 50%).

programmes.name: Finnpartnership — Business Partnership Support
programmes.use_case: Finnish companies establishing partnerships or operations in developing countries
programmes.eligibility: Finnish company or company with substantial Finnish operations.
programmes.notes: Covers feasibility, training, pilots. Similar to DHI but Finnish track. Good for AcriPlug, Tana, NPM.

programmes.name: Business Finland Tempo
programmes.use_case: Quick SME internationalisation — market studies, partner search
programmes.eligibility: Finnish SME with growth ambition.
programmes.notes: Small, fast. Good precursor to Business Finland R&D.

programmes.name: VLAIO Innovation Subsidies
programmes.use_case: Innovation and R&D for Flemish companies
programmes.eligibility: Company with operations in Flanders.
programmes.notes: Relevant if Belgian vendor partners are involved.

programmes.name: ZIM — Central Innovation Programme for SMEs
programmes.use_case: SME innovation, collaboration projects with research institutes
programmes.eligibility: German SME. Collaboration with research institute possible.
programmes.notes: Not de minimis (GBER Art 25). Relevant for German vendor partners like develoPPP ecosystem.

programmes.name: develoPPP — Public-Private Partnerships for Development
programmes.use_case: German exporters investing in developing country markets
programmes.eligibility: German or European company with German operations.
programmes.notes: Larger than DHI equivalent. Covers pilot plants, training, local capacity building.

programmes.name: DEI+ — Energy Innovation Demonstration
programmes.use_case: First-of-kind clean technology demonstration in Netherlands
programmes.eligibility: Company demonstrating innovative energy/climate tech in NL.
programmes.notes: Non-de-minimis. GBER Art 25 caps apply. Cannot overlap with same costs as DHI. Phase 2 escalation from DHI.

programmes.name: Innovatiekrediet — Innovation Credit
programmes.use_case: Technical development — loan repayable only on success
programmes.eligibility: Dutch company with qualifying R&D project.
programmes.notes: Cannot combine with other subsidies on same costs. Can finance separate project phase. Repayable on commercial success. 2026: EUR 50M budget; max EUR 10M/project (technical track). Open 1 Jan – 31 Dec 2026.

programmes.name: MOOI — Mission-Driven R&D & Innovation
programmes.use_case: Multi-party energy/climate innovation consortia
programmes.eligibility: Consortium of at least 3 partners including 1 SME and 1 research org.
programmes.notes: Consortium required. Good for multi-vendor projects. Non-overlapping scope with DEI+. 2026: Pre-registration 17 Mar – 16 Apr (Elektriciteit, Industrie, Gebouwde omgeving, Koolstofverwijdering).

programmes.name: Business Finland R&D Funding
programmes.use_case: R&D, pilots, technology adaptation for Finnish companies
programmes.eligibility: Finnish company performing qualifying R&D.
programmes.notes: Escalation from Tempo/Finnpartnership. Covers larger pilots and technology adaptation.

programmes.name: Swedfund G2G — Project Preparation Facility
programmes.use_case: Government-to-government project preparation with Swedish engineering lead
programmes.eligibility: Swedish lead company. Public sector counterpart in target country required.
programmes.notes: Lanseria: Sweco AB leads, Lanseria SEZ NPC is public counterpart. Up to 100% feasibility costs.

programmes.name: SDE++ — Renewable Energy Operating Subsidy
programmes.use_case: Operating subsidy for renewable energy/heat/CCS installations in NL
programmes.eligibility: Installation in the Netherlands producing qualifying renewable energy.
programmes.notes: Long-term operating subsidy (15yr). Not a project development instrument. Relevant for NL-based assets. 2026: Spring round expected Mar-Apr, Autumn round expected Sep-Oct. NL-only projects.

programmes.name: dtic Manufacturing Incentive
programmes.agency: dtic (SA Department of Trade, Industry and Competition)
programmes.use_case: Manufacturing expansion, SEZ incentives, industrial development
programmes.eligibility: Company manufacturing in South Africa. SEZ location advantageous.
programmes.notes: Lanseria expansion tranche linked to wastewater capacity milestones. Active instruments: MIP, CIP, BIP, SEZ incentive. MCEP closed 2023.

programmes.name: SETA Skills Development Incentive
programmes.agency: Various SETAs (SA Sector Education & Training Authorities)
programmes.use_case: Skills development, training programmes linked to project workforce
programmes.eligibility: South African employer with registered training programmes.
programmes.notes: TWX 2026 Q2 claim (ZAR 3.2M). Funds training as part of project workforce development. EWSETA discretionary grants typically Aug-Nov annually. Green skills emphasis 2025+.

programmes.name: Green Infrastructure Support
programmes.use_case: Green infrastructure, energy storage, climate adaptation projects
programmes.eligibility: Projects in South Africa with demonstrated environmental benefit.
programmes.notes: LanRED Storage Grant Window — ZAR 5.4M application submitted. Original grant programme largely wound down. DBSA now primarily concessional loans. Consider UNDP/GEF or GCF readiness alternatives.

programmes.name: Horizon Europe — Collaborative R&D
programmes.use_case: Collaborative R&D consortia (TRL 6-8), multi-country demonstrations
programmes.eligibility: Consortium of min 3 entities from 3 EU member states. Associated countries eligible.
programmes.notes: Cluster 5 (Climate, Energy & Mobility) for BIAL WtE consortium. High complexity, high reward.

programmes.name: LIFE Programme — Environment & Climate Action
programmes.use_case: Environment, nature conservation, circular economy, climate mitigation
programmes.eligibility: EU-based entity. Non-EU partners can participate but not lead.
programmes.notes: Less competitive than Horizon. Good for circular economy / waste projects.

programmes.name: EIC — European Innovation Council
programmes.use_case: Deep tech scale-up — breakthrough innovation with market potential
programmes.eligibility: SME or startup with EU presence. Pathfinder (early) or Accelerator (scale).
programmes.notes: Blended instrument: non-dilutive grant + equity investment. Very competitive. Two-step: short application (AI-screened) then full proposal + pitch. Success rate ~5%.

programmes.name: Innovation Fund — Large-Scale Climate Tech
programmes.use_case: First-of-kind climate tech at commercial scale — energy, industry, CCU/S
programmes.eligibility: Project in EU/EEA. First commercial-scale deployment of innovative low-carbon tech.
programmes.notes: Funded from EU ETS revenues. Large and small scale tracks. High competition.

programmes.name: Digital Europe Programme
programmes.use_case: Digital infrastructure, AI, cybersecurity, data spaces
programmes.eligibility: EU consortium. Focus on deployment (not R&D).
programmes.notes: Relevant for Cradle Cloud digital sovereignty / AI infrastructure track.

programmes.name: EU Global Gateway ESIM
programmes.use_case: Urban development, smart cities, circular waste, water/wastewater in partner countries
programmes.eligibility: EU consortium. Must address Global Gateway priority areas in non-EU countries.
programmes.notes: Lot 4 — Lanseria concept note deadline 16 Mar 2026. KIRAHub/SCIC consortium model. Up to 90% intensity. ESIM is a mobilisation label, not a standalone grant programme. Access via EFSD+ or DG INTPA project calls.

programmes.name: Interreg — Cross-Border Cooperation
programmes.use_case: Cross-border innovation, pilot projects between EU border regions
programmes.eligibility: Partners from at least 2 eligible border regions.
programmes.notes: Various sub-programmes (North-West Europe, North Sea, etc). Relevant for multi-NL/FI/DE vendor collaborations.

programmes.name: DIF — Development Impact Finance (TA Window)
programmes.use_case: Project preparation and structuring for development-impact investments
programmes.eligibility: Projects targeting developing countries with demonstrated development impact.
programmes.notes: Covers feasibility, ESIA, financial structuring. Cradle Cloud DIF submission. Access via FMO, DEG or EIB as implementing partner. Not standalone open call.

programmes.name: EFSD+ Guarantees — European Fund for Sustainable Development
programmes.use_case: De-risking private investment in developing countries via EU-backed guarantees
programmes.eligibility: Via DFI implementing partner (FMO, EIB, etc). Project in eligible country.
programmes.notes: Not a direct subsidy — provides first-loss or risk-sharing. DFI-led. Not directly accessible by companies — via DFI partners (FMO, DEG, Proparco, EIB, AfDB). EU guarantee up to EUR 135B mobilisation.

programmes.name: FMO — Dutch Development Finance
programmes.use_case: Development finance for infrastructure, energy, agriculture in developing countries
programmes.eligibility: Bankable project in eligible developing country.
programmes.notes: TA window available for project preparation (EUR 200k-500k). Combine with EFSD+ guarantee. 2030 strategy: 50% portfolio in climate finance. Water/sanitation directly in sector focus. SA country desk active.

programmes.name: EIT Climate-KIC Innovation Programmes
programmes.use_case: Climate innovation, decarbonisation, circular economy scale-up
programmes.eligibility: Companies or consortia from EU Member States. Must engage with a KIC co-location centre.
programmes.notes: Rolling innovation programmes and project calls. Most relevant KIC for water/energy/circular. Restructured in 2024.

programmes.name: EIT InnoEnergy — Sustainable Energy Innovation
programmes.use_case: Sustainable energy innovation and scale-up, green hydrogen, energy storage
programmes.eligibility: EU-based energy innovators and scale-ups.
programmes.notes: Focus on green hydrogen and energy storage calls 2025-2026. Also provides equity investment.
